_meanings:
Consisting or
made of food, composed of or 
containing boiled rice; {#Â°koSaH-zaH#} the gross
material body, the {#sTUlaSarIra#}, which
is sustained by food and which is
the fifth or last vesture or wrapper
of the soul; see {#anna#} (2) above and
also {#koSa#}; hence, also the material
world, the coarsest or lowest form
in which Brahma is considered as
manifesting itself in the worldly
existence.
